function.name: intraday_chart
function.description: Provides an intraday chart for a given company. The chart displays the stock price of the company at different time intervals throughout the day.

timeframe.description: Time interval for the intraday chart (e.g., 1min, 5min, 15min, 30min, 1hour, 4hour)

symbol.description: Stock ticker symbol of the company (e.g., AAPL)

from.description: Start date for the intraday data in YYYY-MM-DD format

to.description: End date for the intraday data in YYYY-MM-DD format

extended.description: Whether to include extended hours data (default is false)
